resources.string: - Ishvalans And Ametris Conflict Is Based On Hokkaido s Ainu People. - Arakawa Actually Bought Military Prop Guns For Drawing References. - Arakawa Interviewed WWII Japanese Veterans For The Ishval War Arc. - Law Of Equivalent Exchange Is Not Strictly Based On Eastern Or Western Alchemy. - The Military Officers Are Named After Military Vehicles. - Arakawa s First Name Is Hiromi. - Truth Is A Mirrored Version Of Whoever Enters The Gate. - There Is Only One Known Photo Of Hiromu Arakawa.
